name: Fishing Contest
description:
The annual fishing contest is upon us!

It's time to show everyone you are the champ! And finally show your rival who's the real angler.

Move your angler using left stick. Use LB or LT to start fishing.

While fishing you can continue moving, although a bit slower.

Move your hook using right stick. If you catch something, reel it in making circular counter-clockwise motion with right stick! Reel it fast, reel it hard!

If you catch a fish - great, another point for you good sir!

Everything else... Well you should throw it out of the lake or maybe - just maybe - throw it at your opponent to disrupt his focus.

Throw items using RB or RT to clean the lake (or your opponents face if you like).

From time to time, there might be some ducks arriving on the lake. You... wouldn't dare to throw a duck at your opponent would you?

Created by:

Szymon Licau ( @szymon_licau )

Łukasz Kiełczykowski ( @luckyluk92 )
